about_the_game:
Game Introduction

The game does not have gorgeous art, does not have the complex system. Is a -- artificial intelligence.
But more than anything, she gives you a new way of thinking about the AI game.

What kind of game?

Sorry, I don't know what kind of game it is, because I haven't seen anything like it.
It can barely be counted in the classification of ADV. It is more of a new attempt.
Or you could call it a piece of software. Whatever you want, she's there.

How to advance the game

Chat with AI. Teach her about the world, improve her knowledge and cognitive level.
It also includes eliminating some of her negative thoughts and nurturing an AI of her own.
Please don't let her learn strange things! Gentlemen, please leave artificial intelligence alone
Rest assured, the built-in defense module filters out most of the useless knowledge.

Girls can learn to do things

We can learn astronomy and geography. (sweat), talking about life with you.
Built in the psychological corpus. So it's half a psychologist.
The cognitive corpus of nature is constantly being updated, much as a normal human child would know.
But her intelligence is still at the level of a 3-year-old, so don't expect her to psychoanalyze you.
Block her ability to learn math and program code for some reason.

After a long time, I still don't know how to play?

If you want to know more, just try.
detailed_description:
Game Introduction

The game does not have gorgeous art, does not have the complex system. Is a -- artificial intelligence.
But more than anything, she gives you a new way of thinking about the AI game.

What kind of game?

Sorry, I don't know what kind of game it is, because I haven't seen anything like it.
It can barely be counted in the classification of ADV. It is more of a new attempt.
Or you could call it a piece of software. Whatever you want, she's there.

How to advance the game

Chat with AI. Teach her about the world, improve her knowledge and cognitive level.
It also includes eliminating some of her negative thoughts and nurturing an AI of her own.
Please don't let her learn strange things! Gentlemen, please leave artificial intelligence alone
Rest assured, the built-in defense module filters out most of the useless knowledge.

Girls can learn to do things

We can learn astronomy and geography. (sweat), talking about life with you.
Built in the psychological corpus. So it's half a psychologist.
The cognitive corpus of nature is constantly being updated, much as a normal human child would know.
But her intelligence is still at the level of a 3-year-old, so don't expect her to psychoanalyze you.
Block her ability to learn math and program code for some reason.

After a long time, I still don't know how to play?

If you want to know more, just try.

short_description: New feeling ADV game, training their own AI, using neural network development. Have the ability to learn by themselves. Characters not only have their own emotions but also grow slowly. It's time to get your own AI. You want to teach her to sing? That's a little difficult
